data.text:
Summer training camp would be over soon. Even in the sweltering 
weather, Zenno Rob Roy was working hard, but――
data.processed:
<story>Summer training camp would be over soon. Even in the sweltering 
<story>weather, Zenno Rob Roy was working hard, but――

data.text: ……Huu.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Huu.

data.text:
She let out a deep sigh. She must be tired from the consecutive 
days of training. If that's the case――
data.processed:
<story>She let out a deep sigh. She must be tired from the consecutive 
<story>days of training. If that's the case――

data.text:
Ah, I'm sorry! It's because I'm sighing, isn't it…… 
Um, I'm fine. There's no problem with training――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I'm sorry! It's because I'm sighing, isn't it…… 
<story>Um, I'm fine. There's no problem with training――

data.text: Ah…… my times have gotten this bad……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Ah…… my times have gotten this bad……

data.text:
Even just running was causing her times to slow. Her steps were 
misaligned, and it was starting to become a concern.
data.processed:
<story>Even just running was causing her times to slow. Her steps were 
<story>misaligned, and it was starting to become a concern.

data.text:
B-but, I'm not really tired. 
In terms of stamina, I have plenty left――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>B-but, I'm not really tired. 
<story>In terms of stamina, I have plenty left――

data.text: Trainer-san……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Trainer-san……

data.text:
……Okay, I understand. 
You're saying I need a mental break……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……Okay, I understand. 
<story>You're saying I need a mental break……

data.text:
That said, it's true that the training amount 
shouldn't be a problem stamina-wise. Does she 
have a lot of built up mental fatigue?
data.processed:
<story>That said, it's true that the training amount 
<story>shouldn't be a problem stamina-wise. Does she 
<story>have a lot of built up mental fatigue?

data.text:
Now that I think about it, the locals 
mentioned a great spot to see the fireworks from.

choices.text: ……would she want to go see them?

data.processed:
<story>Now that I think about it, the locals 
<story>mentioned a great spot to see the fireworks from.

data.text:
The fireworks wouldn't be until night time. 
Maybe I should scope the place out first.
data.processed:
<story>The fireworks wouldn't be until night time. 
<story>Maybe I should scope the place out first.

data.text:
……I wonder where Trainer-san went. 
They're not in their room, either……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……I wonder where Trainer-san went. 
<story>They're not in their room, either……

data.text:
(I wanted to tell them I'd work hard during training tomorrow. 
……since I was having trouble concentrating today)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I wanted to tell them I'd work hard during training tomorrow. 
<story>……since I was having trouble concentrating today)

data.text:
(……Am I pushing my ideals on to them? 
Even during training, that was the thought occupying my mind)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(……Am I pushing my ideals on to them? 
<story>Even during training, that was the thought occupying my mind)

data.text:
(They're considerate, and passionate about work. I know that. 
They're already a wonderful person…… just the way they are)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(They're considerate, and passionate about work. I know that. 
<story>They're already a wonderful person…… just the way they are)

data.text:
(I wonder if…… I said something unnecessary. If they're pushing 
themself too hard to change, what should I do……?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(I wonder if…… I said something unnecessary. If they're pushing 
<story>themself too hard to change, what should I do……?)

data.text: They're not here either……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>They're not here either……

data.text:
Ah, you're the girl they're responsible for 
right? They left their phone in the cafeteria 
so I haven't been able to contact them.
data.name: Trainer's Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Ah, you're the girl they're responsible for 
<story>right? They left their phone in the cafeteria 
<story>so I haven't been able to contact them.

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Eh?

data.text:
Some people said they went in to the mountains but……that can't be 
right. There's no reason to go there after all.
data.name: Trainer's Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Some people said they went in to the mountains but……that can't be 
<story>right. There's no reason to go there after all.

data.text:
……t-towards the mountains? It's night time though. 
Then…… it can't be, but does that mean that right now――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……t-towards the mountains? It's night time though. 
<story>Then…… it can't be, but does that mean that right now――

data.text:
『Haa, haa…… if I can just cross this rope bridge, 
then…… I can return to Zenno Rob Roy's side……!』
data.name: Trainer-san
data.processed:
<story>『Haa, haa…… if I can just cross this rope bridge, 
<story>then…… I can return to Zenno Rob Roy's side……!』

data.text: 『……! Ugh, it's collapsing……! Aaaaaaahhhh……!』
data.name: Trainer-san
data.processed: <story>『……! Ugh, it's collapsing……! Aaaaaaahhhh……!』

data.text: T-Trainer-san……! Aaah…… what should I do……!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>T-Trainer-san……! Aaah…… what should I do……!?

data.text:
Oh, sorry. They probably just ended up falling asleep somewhere. 
They're always working late trying to keep up with you.
data.name: Trainer's Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Oh, sorry. They probably just ended up falling asleep somewhere. 
<story>They're always working late trying to keep up with you.

data.text:
I wonder if that manga I lent them has gotten them fired up? 
It was really interesting after all.
data.name: Trainer's Colleague
data.processed:
<story>I wonder if that manga I lent them has gotten them fired up? 
<story>It was really interesting after all.

data.text:
M-manga? 
Do you mean…… those thick, technical-looking books?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>M-manga? 
<story>Do you mean…… those thick, technical-looking books?

data.text:
Right, right! Well, I said they're manga but, there's a lot of 
training and medical related topics. Seems like it was made in to 
a manga to make it easier to understand.
data.name: Trainer's Colleague
data.processed:
<story>Right, right! Well, I said they're manga but, there's a lot of 
<story>training and medical related topics. Seems like it was made in to 
<story>a manga to make it easier to understand.

data.text: ……Training and medical……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Training and medical……

data.text:
That reminds me, they started going to the gym. 
Before starting a new training regimen, they mentioned that 
they wanted to test it themself first.
data.name: Trainer's Colleague
data.processed:
<story>That reminds me, they started going to the gym. 
<story>Before starting a new training regimen, they mentioned that 
<story>they wanted to test it themself first.

data.text: Really, when it comes to you, they go all out.
data.name: Trainer's Colleague
data.processed: <story>Really, when it comes to you, they go all out.

data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>!

data.text:
Haaa, haa…… not here either. 
…… Trainer-san……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Haaa, haa…… not here either. 
<story>…… Trainer-san……!

data.text:
……I-it's fine. It's fine. 
Trainer-san is an adult, and they've got it together……
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……I-it's fine. It's fine. 
<story>Trainer-san is an adult, and they've got it together……

data.text:
(And they promised. That we'd finish that story together. 
That's why, that's why――)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(And they promised. That we'd finish that story together. 
<story>That's why, that's why――)

data.text:
(That's right. This isn't forcing my ideals on them. 
It's definitely not. ……After all――)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(That's right. This isn't forcing my ideals on them. 
<story>It's definitely not. ……After all――)

data.text: This is what they call trust……!!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>This is what they call trust……!!

data.text:
Trainer-san, Trainer-san! 
Please answer me, Trainer-san!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san, Trainer-san! 
<story>Please answer me, Trainer-san!

data.text: ! Trainer-san!!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>! Trainer-san!!

data.text: I'm glad, so this is where you were……!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>I'm glad, so this is where you were……!

data.text:
Zenno Rob Roy appeared in front of me, her face full of worry. 
……I guess I got tired after walking and fell asleep.
data.processed:
<story>Zenno Rob Roy appeared in front of me, her face full of worry. 
<story>……I guess I got tired after walking and fell asleep.

data.text:
I came all the way out here to make her happy…… 
but it seems like all I did was trouble her.

choices.text: I guess I'm still far away from your ideal――
choices.processed: <size=38>I guess I'm still far away from your ideal――</size>

choices.text: I guess I'm still far away from your ideal――
choices.processed: <size=38>I guess I'm still far away from your ideal――</size>

data.processed:
<story>I came all the way out here to make her happy…… 
<story>but it seems like all I did was trouble her.

data.text:
……You're wrong! Trainer-san, you're fine the 
way you are! Just because of something I said――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy

choices.text: Being your ideal is one of my dreams
Being your ideal is one of my dreams

data.processed:
<story>……You're wrong! Trainer-san, you're fine the 
<story>way you are! Just because of something I said――

data.text: Eh……Eeeh, eh!?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Eh……Eeeh, eh!?

data.text:
(B-becoming my ideal……huh!? 
I-isn't that…… w-wait…… c-calm down……!)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(B-becoming my ideal……huh!? 
<story>I-isn't that…… w-wait…… c-calm down……!)

data.text:
……Haa-…… Huu-…… U-ummmm…… well, 
Trainer-san…… why did you come all the way out here?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……Haa-…… Huu-…… U-ummmm…… well, 
<story>Trainer-san…… why did you come all the way out here?

data.text:
I didn't really know what to say, but I should 
be honest after worrying her like that. I wanted her to 
cheer up after seeing the scenery. And so――

choices.text: Rob Roy, I just wanted to make you happy……
choices.processed: <size=36>Rob Roy, I just wanted to make you happy……</size>

data.processed:
<story>I didn't really know what to say, but I should 
<story>be honest after worrying her like that. I wanted her to 
<story>cheer up after seeing the scenery. And so――

data.text: ……Because of me――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>……Because of me――

data.text:
At that moment, before Zenno Rob Roy could finish, the fireworks 
started. Enveloped in that sound, Zenno Rob Roy spoke again.
data.processed:
<story>At that moment, before Zenno Rob Roy could finish, the fireworks 
<story>started. Enveloped in that sound, Zenno Rob Roy spoke again.

data.text:
……No. For…… my sake. Right. 
That's how…… Trainer-san is.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……No. For…… my sake. Right. 
<story>That's how…… Trainer-san is.

data.text:
Eventually, the fireworks died down. There was only the 
gentle sound of the waves, and Zenno Rob Roy was softly smiling.
data.processed:
<story>Eventually, the fireworks died down. There was only the 
<story>gentle sound of the waves, and Zenno Rob Roy was softly smiling.

data.text:
Trainer-san is already my ideal. 
Kind, hard working, and――
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Trainer-san is already my ideal. 
<story>Kind, hard working, and――

data.text:
……someone irreplaceable for a hero…… 
a warm presence, someone they want to cherish.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>……someone irreplaceable for a hero…… 
<story>a warm presence, someone they want to cherish.

data.text:
The last fireworks went off. Zenno Rob Roy looked up 
at the sky, her face colored by the vivid light.
data.processed:
<story>The last fireworks went off. Zenno Rob Roy looked up 
<story>at the sky, her face colored by the vivid light.
